title: Fanny and the Monsters and Other Stories
description: Fanny and the Monsters and Other StoriesFanny Stanton is of the opinion that being the eldest of eight children is bad - but being a girl is even worse! Fanny and the Monsters contains three delightful stories about the irrepressible Fanny, who is expected to lead the life of a demure Victorian Girl but whose spirit and sense of adventure constantly lead her into trouble of one sort or another!
author: Penelope Lively
